website_summaries.verdict: Many tradespeople and stilt-walking entertainers seek out these ultralight but sturdy stilts because of their comfort after hours of use.
pros: Interlocking side struts for added stability
cons: Some parts reported missing upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stilts! I’ve had a few pairs over the years and these are the best performance stilts I’ve ever used! They are sturdy and reliable. I can jump and do turns all night long without ever second guessing my stilts. The only con that I can think of is that I wish they came with a smaller foot plate, I have a size 6 shoe and the straps hardly cover my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I use these for commercial construction, and I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I'm drywall/metal stud installer, and I also do acoustical ceilings and panels. I bought a cheaper brand first, and they broke while I was wearing them. This pair, however, has worked out very well so far, and appear to be much sturdier than the cheaper brands you can find here on Amazon. I am new to using stilts, but the leg straps on these are much more comfortable than the others, and I feel more balanced on these. So far, I'd say they are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly comfortable. The dual support post make a world of a difference compared to other models. They are nicely built and for their simplicity does what I need them to do and that is allow me to wear them hours on end with no pain or discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jose G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy under a big guy
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of stilts. They are super comfortable, after some adjustments and I had no issue wearing them for extended periods (4hrs+). I am in the 230lb range and had no failures while in use. I'd buy them again and glad I did my research before I made this kind of investment.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beats carrying a scaffold with you all the time, grab your stilts with your lunch box, tools and go
customer_reviews.author: Glen Kirn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Great and sturdy stilts! I don't use them for dry walling, but for performances and there extremely comfortable to walk in. I would recommend them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Summerdayy Valerio

customer_reviews.title: Great quality stilts comfortable and stable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality stilts comfortable and stable. Im going to need to replace the straps soon, I use them every day for three years now.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are the only stilts I will purchase from here on very sturdy and just like an extended leg easy to walk on
customer_reviews.author: Hersh

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made
customer_reviews.text: These by far are the most comfortable pair I’ve own. I’m extremely flat footed but I’ve been able to wear these for hrs compared to the single sided stilts.
customer_reviews.author: Joey A.

customer_reviews.title: Dual support rods are very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Oddly I bought these for my girlfriend. She works for Universal Studios and wants to become a stilt Walker for the park. These were highly recommended by the other stilt walkers......she seems to love them and they are very secure and easy to learn on. The dual support rods seem to be what separates this brand from other.
customer_reviews.author: Medic435

customer_reviews.title: Safety is everything. The stilts have it in spades
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned many pair of these stilts. They’re awesome. I live on these things use them every day. They’ve got to be strong and they’ve got to be safe they have it
customer_reviews.author: John Wingert

customer_reviews.title: Buy duras
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to do side work with. The company I work for uses dura stilts. I gotta be honest I like dura stilts better. These aren't bad but assembly directions sucked and the screws under the heel plate part made no sense. I'm assuming the part in the picture just didn't come with it. But I still use them so I obviously didn't need them. If I could go back I would have spent the extra 40 on dura stilts
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable great leg support very easy to walk with
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed purchase
customer_reviews.text: My item was damaged upon receiving it all the bolts was loose in the box and a couple of them was missing which I had to replace out of pocket was afraid to return them because I needed them for work and it took so long to get them in the first place real disappoint on this order
customer_reviews.author: Rod McVicker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and easier to walk than the previous ones I owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Because of the size of the box, it was better for the stilts. I was hoping for something inside though, but they are sturdy enough that they were ok...
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Max height not as sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not so cool that at its max height of 40 inches only one wing nut bolt is slotted for each leg. Not as sturdy as it could be with that. Coworkers have the same complaint. Shouldn't advertise it going to 40 inches when it doesn't and keep the same sturdiness. Other than that it's the only pair I've had. I would've maybe gone with a different range if it was 38 inches max and not 40.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Not totally as described. All pictures in item description showed a wider 1.5” arch strap. The stilts did not come with it. Instead they came with a narrower one. A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: drgypsum

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My dad and I bought these since we hang drywall and the others wore out. Absolutely the most comfortable stilts I’ve ever worn. Would definitely buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Dakota R.

product_meta.title: SurPro S2.1 Dual Legs Support Magnesium Drywall Stilts 24-40 in. (SUR-S2-2440MP)
product_meta.description: If you are in the market for a set of drywall stilts, stop looking! SurPro Tool is an industry leader in drywall supplies and accessories. They sell more lifts, stilts, and accessories than most other sellers combined. The SurPro S2.1 Magnesium Drywall Stilts are perfect for drywall painting, electrical, drop ceilings, and many other applications. These are made of Magnesium and a bit lighter than their Aluminum Drywall Stilts. and are backed up with a full 1 year warranty. The exclusive wing bolt design offers flexibility and versatility--now you can adjust the height without tools. In our opinion, these are the lightest, safest, and most durable set of stilts on the market in this price range. You will not be disappointed. Features Include: 1) Quad Lock Technology: Double Wingbolt design for added security. Improves the stability of the extension legs providing extra safety and increased force resistance. 2) Unique "Dually" design features two side supports that improve balance and stability (especially at full extension - and for larger users.) 3) Wider and Lighter - New patented design and construction offers lightweight, better balance, and improved mobility 4) Increased Comfort - The new wrap-around leg band system and wider contoured foot plate offer superior comfort and increased stability 5) Security - 3-position oversized heel bracket and foot plate with inter-looping straps offer ease of use and increase safety 5) Interlok - The new Interlok side pole bracket is a "must have" safety feature that locks the support poles securely to the frame system for increased safety
